page.title: 01Gazetter of the Knowle Area
page.content: The Knowle area is on the S. fringe of West Midlands area and is "urban" and "rural" in nature. It is separated from the conurbation by a narrow band of green fields and the M42 motorway. The area can be divided into 2 sections W. and E. The W. part is mostly suburban housing centred on Knowle for the conurbation. Since the War housing has spread S.W. from Knowle absorbing the hamlet of Bentley Heath where the most recent housing estates are still being built. The E. area is "green belt" land forming a "buffer zone" between Birmingham and Coventry. Currently it is farming countryside with limited industrial and housing development in the local villages eg Berkswell.
